verses.text_plain: The king’s heart is in the hand of the Lord, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.
verses.verse_html: 1The king’s heart is in the hand of the Lord, as the rivers of water: he turneth it whithersoever he will.

verses.text_plain: Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the Lord pondereth the hearts.
verses.verse_html: 2Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the Lord pondereth the hearts.

verses.text_plain: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the Lord than sacrifice.
verses.verse_html: 3To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the Lord than sacrifice.

verses.text_plain: An high look, and a proud heart, and the plowing of the wicked, is sin.
verses.verse_html:
4An high look, and a proud heart, and the plowing of the wicked, is sin. ▼
▼ An…: Heb. Haughtiness of eyes
 , ▼
▼ the plowing: or, the light

footnotes.body_html: ▼ An…: Heb. Haughtiness of eyes
▼ the plowing: or, the light

verses.text_plain: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.
verses.verse_html: 5The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.

verses.text_plain: The getting of treasures by a lying tongue is a vanity tossed to and fro of them that seek death.
verses.verse_html: 6The getting of treasures by a lying tongue is a vanity tossed to and fro of them that seek death.

verses.text_plain: The robbery of the wicked shall destroy them; because they refuse to do judgment.
verses.verse_html:
7The robbery of the wicked shall destroy them; because they refuse to do judgment. ▼
▼ destroy…: Heb. saw them, or, dwell with them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ destroy…: Heb. saw them, or, dwell with them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ destroy…: Heb. saw them, or, dwell with them

verses.text_plain: The way of man is froward and strange: but as for the pure, his work is right.
verses.verse_html: 8The way of man is froward and strange: but as for the pure, his work is right.

verses.text_plain: It is better to dwell in a corner of the housetop, than with a brawling woman in a wide house.
verses.verse_html:
9It is better to dwell in a corner of the housetop, than with a brawling woman in a wide house. ▼
▼ a brawling…: Heb. a woman of contentions
 , ▼
▼ a wide…: Heb. an house of society

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a brawling…: Heb. a woman of contentions
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a brawling…: Heb. a woman of contentions

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a wide…: Heb. an house of society
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a wide…: Heb. an house of society

verses.text_plain: The soul of the wicked desireth evil: his neighbour findeth no favour in his eyes.
verses.verse_html:
10The soul of the wicked desireth evil: his neighbour findeth no favour in his eyes. ▼
▼ findeth…: Heb. is not favoured

footnotes.body_html: ▼ findeth…: Heb. is not favoured

verses.text_plain: When the scorner is punished, the simple is made wise: and when the wise is instructed, he receiveth knowledge.
verses.verse_html: 11When the scorner is punished, the simple is made wise: and when the wise is instructed, he receiveth knowledge.

verses.text_plain: The righteous man wisely considereth the house of the wicked: but God overthroweth the wicked for their wickedness.
verses.verse_html: 12The righteous man wisely considereth the house of the wicked: but God overthroweth the wicked for their wickedness.

verses.text_plain: Whoso stoppeth his ears at the cry of the poor, he also shall cry himself, but shall not be heard.
verses.verse_html: 13Whoso stoppeth his ears at the cry of the poor, he also shall cry himself, but shall not be heard.

tokens.text: himself, but shall not be heard

verses.text_plain: A gift in secret pacifieth anger: and a reward in the bosom strong wrath.
verses.verse_html: 14A gift in secret pacifieth anger: and a reward in the bosom strong wrath.

verses.text_plain: It is joy to the just to do judgment: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.
verses.verse_html: 15It is joy to the just to do judgment: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.

verses.text_plain: The man that wandereth out of the way of understanding shall remain in the congregation of the dead.
verses.verse_html: 16The man that wandereth out of the way of understanding shall remain in the congregation of the dead.

verses.text_plain: He that loveth pleasure shall be a poor man: he that loveth wine and oil shall not be rich.
verses.verse_html:
17He that loveth pleasure shall be a poor man: he that loveth wine and oil shall not be rich. ▼
▼ pleasure: or, sport

verses.text_plain: The wicked shall be a ransom for the righteous, and the transgressor for the upright.
verses.verse_html: 18The wicked shall be a ransom for the righteous, and the transgressor for the upright.

verses.text_plain: It is better to dwell in the wilderness, than with a contentious and an angry woman.
verses.verse_html:
19It is better to dwell in the wilderness, than with a contentious and an angry woman. ▼
▼ in…: Heb. in the land of the desert

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in…: Heb. in the land of the desert
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in…: Heb. in the land of the desert

verses.text_plain: There is treasure to be desired and oil in the dwelling of the wise; but a foolish man spendeth it up.
verses.verse_html: 20There is treasure to be desired and oil in the dwelling of the wise; but a foolish man spendeth it up.

verses.text_plain: He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.
verses.verse_html: 21He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.

verses.text_plain: A wise man scaleth the city of the mighty, and casteth down the strength of the confidence thereof.
verses.verse_html: 22A wise man scaleth the city of the mighty, and casteth down the strength of the confidence thereof.

verses.text_plain: Whoso keepeth his mouth and his tongue keepeth his soul from troubles.
verses.verse_html: 23Whoso keepeth his mouth and his tongue keepeth his soul from troubles.

verses.text_plain: Proud and haughty scorner is his name, who dealeth in proud wrath.
verses.verse_html:
24Proud and haughty scorner is his name, who dealeth in proud wrath. ▼
▼ in proud…: Heb. in the wrath of pride

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in proud…: Heb. in the wrath of pride
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in proud…: Heb. in the wrath of pride

verses.text_plain: The desire of the slothful killeth him; for his hands refuse to labour.
verses.verse_html: 25The desire of the slothful killeth him; for his hands refuse to labour.

verses.text_plain: He coveteth greedily all the day long: but the righteous giveth and spareth not.
verses.verse_html: 26He coveteth greedily all the day long: but the righteous giveth and spareth not.

verses.text_plain: The sacrifice of the wicked is abomination: how much more, when he bringeth it with a wicked mind?
verses.verse_html:
27The sacrifice of the wicked is abomination: how much more, when he bringeth it with a wicked mind? ▼
▼ with…: Heb. in wickedness?

footnotes.body_html: ▼ with…: Heb. in wickedness?

verses.text_plain: A false witness shall perish: but the man that heareth speaketh constantly.
verses.verse_html:
28A false witness shall perish: but the man that heareth speaketh constantly. ▼
▼ A…: Heb. A witness of lies

footnotes.body_text: ▼ A…: Heb. A witness of lies
footnotes.body_html: ▼ A…: Heb. A witness of lies

verses.text_plain: A wicked man hardeneth his face: but as for the upright, he directeth his way.
verses.verse_html:
29A wicked man hardeneth his face: but as for the upright, he directeth his way. ▼
▼ directeth: or, considereth

verses.text_plain: There is no wisdom nor understanding nor counsel against the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 30There is no wisdom nor understanding nor counsel against the Lord.

verses.text_plain: The horse is prepared against the day of battle: but safety is of the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
31The horse is prepared against the day of battle: but safety is of the Lord. ▼
▼ safety: or, victory
